imdb.plot outline: "The OTHER View" Our "Talk" is edgy, bold, and will most certainly "push buttons" hence provoking spiritual growth! A lively and sometimes unpredictable half hour talk show, which tackles a wide range of relevant issues, controversial subjects and current news topics with tough truth and wit thrown in the mix. Providing colorful feature segments with an array of notable guests, The Ladies of "The OTHER View" offers a fresh perspective on issues ranging from Health, Beauty, Political, along with It will make you blush topics as well.
